headline: Carrier to Present at Baird's 2025 Global Industrial Conference
summary: Carrier Global Corporation (NYSE: CARR) Chairman & CEO David Gitlin and Senior Vice President & CFO Patrick Goris will speak at the Baird 2025 Global Industrial Conference on Wednesday, November 12, 2025, at 12:00 p.m. CT (1:00 p.m. ET).

headline: Carrier Global Corp (CARR) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Navigating Challenges with ...
summary: Despite a decline in residential sales, Carrier Global Corp (CARR) reports strong commercial performance and announces a $5 billion share repurchase authorization.

headline: Carrier Global (CARR): Margin Declines Undercut Bullish Narratives Despite Strong Profit Growth Forecasts
summary: Carrier Global (CARR) posted a net profit margin of 6.3%, which is down from last year’s 7.3%. This continues a five-year trend of declining earnings, with an average annual drop of 11.7%. Despite the negative earnings growth in the past year, analysts now forecast a sharp turnaround, with earnings expected to grow 23.5% per year, well ahead of the broader US market’s 15.6% forecast. While revenue is projected to grow at a slower 4.3% pace annually, shares currently trade at $60.75, below the...
